article.title: SAIC Receives Contract for Emerging Technologies in C4ISR
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) is being awarded a $33.3 million, indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract with a cost-plus-fixed-fee pricing arrangement for emerging technologies and systems for positioning, navigation and timing for command, control, communications, computers, intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance (C4ISR) systems. The work includes research, investigation and test and evaluation of emerging navigation technologies, sensors and systems with potential for applicability in the areas of air, ground and shipboard C4ISR system technologies and position, navigation and timing systems.
